messages.subject: guidance
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/15/02 8:30:19 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Myranda, I love that statement!  Nicely put into a nutshell! Thanks, Namaste, Kathi [Non-text
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/15/02 8:30:19 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
myrandab@... writes:


> The idea is to guide, imposing restrictions if necessary, the children
> toward safe and healthful decisions while young, and gradually let go of
> the guidance and/or restrictions as they get older and better able to
> regulate themselves.
>

Myranda, I love that statement! Nicely put into a nutshell!
Thanks,
Namaste,
Kathi
